name: Galactic Shooter Saga
description:
Space shooter with 18 levels and 3 levels of difficulty in campaign mode in which through an open world you will learn about the formation of various constellations of stars and fight against numerous enemies in a fast-paced shooting game.

Play with over 15 different spaceships and fight hundreds of enemies.

You can also play in survival mode, where the common denominator is to shoot and try to survive waves of enemies.

In both campaign and survival modes you can post your score and compete against other players for the best.
